★ WHY IS LIMENEX AWESOME ★

This is why you will regret not signing up earlier...

  • High Performance Servers
    We put our heart and soul into building our powerful enterprise-grade servers with Dual Intel Xeon Processors, 64GB RAM and solid state drives (SSD) in RAID 10. If that's not enough, our innovative software, advanced in-house optimisation techniques and many other secret recipes work together to create a reliable and unparalled high performance web hosting experience that makes you wonder why we didn't charge more!
  • Premium Features
    Our premium high performance web hosting is filled with incredible premium features and services including LiteSpeed, CloudLinux, R1Soft, SpamExperts, CloudFlare, Softaculous script installer, Website Builder, MariaDB and many more! We love to stay ahead of the competition...wait...do we have any?
  • Amazing Prices
    Despite investing heavily in delivering a superior high performance web hosting experience, we are priced at extremely competitive and affordable rates to keep our customers happy and ensure we can deliver a consistently reliable service in the long run. Win-win ain't it?
  • 99.9% Uptime
    Keeping your websites up is our bread and butter. Unlike most of our competitors that offer negligible compensation, as written in our industry-leading SLA, we will give you a FULL month of FREE service if the uptime for the given month is less than 99.9%. No we're not kidding.
  • US & UK Servers
    We have servers in United States & United Kingdom! Take your closest pick to get the fastest speed for your websites!
  • Instant Activation
    Why bother waiting for someone to setup your account manually when we setup your account instantly after you made payment?
  • Operating Since 2010
    Limenex has been in business for 7 solid years and counting! This is a testament to the reliability and quality of our high performance web hosting service our customers expect of us. We aren't amateurs in the business.
  • Premium 24/7 Support
    We have professional staffs on standby 24/7 to watch over our servers and assist you whenever you need it! We pride ourselves with our industry leading response time of 10-15 minutes! They don't sleep, do they?
  • 30 Days Moneyback Guarantee
    Don't be afraid to try our high performance web hosting! With our 30 days moneyback guarantee, it is absolutely risk-free! We will return you your money if you hate us, but I bet you'll love us!

★ CUSTOMERS FEEDBACK ★

We aren't lying when we say our high performance web hosting service is top-notch. Take a look at what our lovely clients say about us!

There is no justice if I don't write this review for Limenex! Do they sleep at all? The longest I had to wait for a reply was 31 minutes. Most of the time I receive 5 minutes reply from them! My other hosters usually take 1 or 2 hours to tell me something useless, even though they are more expensive! My websites at Limenex are very fast and they even have r1soft backup which is very useful as I used it to restore a file I accidentally deleted for free! One of my other hoster even charge money to only restore my entire cPanel!

Limenex is excellent value for money. I will move all my websites to Limenex once my contract with other hosters expire. Cheaper and better service.
